title: Flutter & ReactJS Developer
description:
Gorin Systems is a fast-growing USA dev company that builds apps that improve
the world - for the good.  We are looking for a remote part-time to full-time
NodeJS & ReactJS developer to start immediately on several projects. We offer
long-term job stability, training with our lead developers, meaningful projects,
annual raises, bonuses, and more.Fluent English, Written & Verbal. Excellent
communication4-year Computer Science Degree or Equivalent experienceAt least one
year of experience with React & FlutterAvailable for meetings between 9 am to 1
pm EST.  Outside of those hours can work any timeWilling to do identity
verification Please apply if: you have 1+ years of professional
experiencelengthy technical assessments do not deter youyou can join us
immediately
